# pose

**Instance Property**

The position and orientation of the seat around the table.

## Declaration

```swift
var pose: TableVisualState.Pose2D
```

## Setting the data that syncs

- **playerID**: The identifier for the player who occupies the seat.

items.description: The identifier for the player who occupies the seat.
items.name: playerID
